{"step_by_step_thinking": "To determine which of the following is an obligate intracellular parasite, we need to refer to the relevant documents that discuss obligate intracellular parasites. Document [0] mentions that certain bacteria, including Chlamydia and Rickettsia, are obligate intracellular parasites. Document [1] also mentions Bartonella henselae as a facultative intracellular parasite. Document [6] discusses Rickettsia prowazekii as an obligate intracellular parasite. Document [11] mentions Coxiella burnetii as an obligate intracellular parasite. Based on this information, the correct answer is D. Coxiella burnetii.", "answer_choice": "D"}
